Body: Description: Hi, we are currently experiencing issue raising a support ticket on the platform, after inputting the support details, and we click on open ticket, it keeps rolling. the reason we want to eaise a support ticket is due to our inability to integrate Netwrix enterprise auditor with our azure AD and atm domains we get the below error Errors: 1: Status(StatusCode="Internal", Detail="Return code from installer: 643", DebugException="Grpc.Core.Internal.CoreErrorDetailException: {"created":"@1743153001.101000000","description":"Error received from peer ipv4:127.0.0.1:3740","file":"......srccorelibsurfacecall.cc","file_line":953,"grpc_message":"Return code from installer: 643","grpc_status":13}") 1.1: {"created":"@1743153001.101000000","description":"Error received from peer ipv4:127.0.0.1:3740","file":"......srccorelibsurfacecall.cc","file_line":953,"grpc_message":"Return code from installer: 643","grpc_status":13}
Steps to Reproduce Updated: Azure AD scan attempt
What We've Learned Updated: They are trying to add their Entra ID to the product, probably ignoring the prereqs
Next Steps Updated: Analyze the logs and send the requirements
